text: allahu avatarippicca, vedagranthattilulla karyannal maraccuvekkukayum, atinnu vilayayi tucchamaya nettannal netiyetukkukayum ceyyunnavararea avar tannalute vayarukalil tinnu nirakkunnat narakagniyallate marreannumalla. uyirttelunnelpinre nalil allahu avareat sansarikkukayea (papannalil ninnâ€Œ) avare sansud'dharakkukayea ceyyukayilla. avarkk vedanayeriya siksayuntayirikkukayum ceyyum
